availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Muir (Louisville, Kentucky insurance officer and notary public)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky insurance officer and notary public. Kentucky native. Son of John Muir and Maria Muir. Married to Augusta E. Sawtell in Louisville, Kentucky, in September 1859. Father of Maria Muir and William Muir. Insurance officer in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Notary public in Jefferson County.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 96.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, New York, Saratoga County, Saratoga Springs, p. 106A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000819611.
"William Muir (1834-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial 209115553, accessed October 28, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/209115553.
KYR-0001-017-0279.
